validation.output: BUILD SUCCEEDED - Stop model extended with primaryRouteType/transportIcon/routeTypeDisplayName, SearchView updated with HStack icon layout

next_checkpoint_context: Stop model now has primaryRouteType computed property (queries pattern_stops→patterns→routes joins, returns most frequent route_type per stop). transportIcon and routeTypeDisplayName computed properties map GTFS route_type to SF Symbol names and accessibility labels. SearchView displays icons with HStack layout and VoiceOver accessibility. Performance note: primaryRouteType queries DB on each access (acceptable per design, optimize later if p95 >200ms).

uncertainties_researched: SF Symbols transport icons - verified via ios-research-sf-symbols-transport.md
